metadata.Title: CVE-2018-16981 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium.
metadata.Description: stb stb_image.h 2.19, as used in catimg, Emscripten, and other products, has a heap-based buffer overflow in the stbi__out_gif_code function.

criterions.comment: catimg package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
ccextractor package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
goxel package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
